title: Maxar Technologies awarded $44 million contract renewal by U.S. National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency
key_assets: ['Global Enhanced GEOINT Delivery (G-EGD) program', 'high-resolution commercial imagery', 'SAR data integration (Capella Space, ICEYE, Umbra, PredaSAR)']
summary: Maxar Technologies has been awarded a $44 million contract renewal (Option Year 3) by the U.S. National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency (NGA) for the Global Enhanced GEOINT Delivery (G-EGD) program. The contract includes continued provision of high-resolution commercial imagery and integration of SAR data from providers like ICEYE, Capella Space, Umbra, and PredaSAR.
why_it_matters: This contract renewal underscores Maxar's role as a key provider of geospatial intelligence to the U.S. government, particularly in integrating commercial SAR data (including ICEYE) into the G-EGD platform. It highlights the growing importance of SAR data for national security and humanitarian missions, as well as Maxar's expanding capabilities in this domain.
